alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 22 at 11:27AM EST until December 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schroon River at Riverbank. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water reaches moderate flood stage. Water surrounds several homes on Schroon River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:01 AM EST Friday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 5.9 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schroon River Riverbank Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Fri 11 am: 7.8 Forecast: Fri 1 pm 7.8 Fri 7 pm 7.6 Sat 1 am 7.4 Sat 7 am 7.2 Sat 1 pm 7.0 Sat 7 pm 6.8 Sun 1 am 6.6 Sun 7 am 6.4 Sun 1 pm 6.3 Sun 7 pm 6.2 Mon 1 am 6.0 Mon 7 am 5.9 &&
